name: GNU Nano
description: GNU Nano is an easy-to-use text editor originally designed as a replacement for Pico, the editor included in the Pine email suite. As a text editor, Nano provides a straightforward, keyboard-centric interface for editing files. It is ideal for both new and advanced users who seek a lightweight editor, mainly configured for editing configuration files and quick file editing tasks. Nano includes several features such as syntax highlighting, search and replace, indenting, and UTF-8 support.
